messages.message:
My friend Tom said the restaurant at the hotel looks nice. It's the Copper something Resort.
I just looked:  Copper Wynd in Fountain Hills about 25 miles out of town.
My morning flight was canceled due to fog so I now fly at 10:20am arriving in Phoenix at 4:14.
How about 7pm you guys come to the resort??
The room is in the name: Thomas Cosgrove.

Right now I do not have my phone!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! I left it home. I'm hoping my girlfriend gets either the email I sent or the FB message and dreives back to my house (30 min fro her house and then 45 min to the airport and 30 min back to her home!!!!  Thank God she is a GREAT friend!  She already left her house at 4:15 to pick me up at 5 to get me to the airport.  United forgot to inform the passengers that the flight was canceled!!!
Let me know you got this!!

Brian
Yes I got it. Are you at copper Wynd in fountain hills?
Oh I saw it. OK 7 works.
They have a great happy hour but their dinner menu is pretentious.
See you at 7! Then we hang out with Colleen at 9

Brian
Two Facebook accounts is a good idea.  I am going to do that when I get my robot up and running.

Brian
Q: What gets wetter the more it dries?
A: A towel.

Brian
Q: What makes the calendar seem so popular?
A: Because it has a lot of dates!

Brian
Q: What part of the car is the laziest?
A: The wheels, because they are always tired!A: The wheels, because they are always tired!
